thread.title: Joshua Bezucha
thread.title_full: Sportbike Track Gear reviewed by Joshua Bezucha

author: Joshua Bezucha
title: Joshua Bezucha
text: I ordered a clutch kit for a cb900. An entire clutch kit was shown in the picture, (Metal plates, aprings, friction discs). I thought I was getting the whole kit, but only the friction discs showed up. The fine print said, "not all kits complete", but of course, they never said, "This kit not complete". So I ended up paying twice as much for a set of friction discs.
